kv12.4:1.3: Sukhavedaniyaṁ dukkhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:1.5: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:1.7: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.4:2.4: Cakkhāyatanaṁ vipāko, cakkhāyatanaṁ sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:3.1: Cakkhāyatanaṁ vipāko, cakkhāyatanaṁ na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:4.6: Sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:4.8: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:4.10: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.4:5.4: Kāyāyatanaṁ vipāko, kāyāyatanaṁ sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:5.6: kāyāyatanaṁ vipāko, kāyāyatanaṁ na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:6.6: Hañci saḷāyatanaṁ kammassa katattā uppannaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
